short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make payments with your favourite merchant using Solana.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StellarSOL is a browser extension that lets you do online shopping with USDC. The bridge between Solana and e-commerce stores is so broken, that itâ€™s a time-consuming process to purchase things online. For every person earning in USDC, we become the one-stop solution for your seamless online shopping.
